results.title: Large language model - Wikipedia
results.content: A large language model (LLM) is a computational model notable for its ability to achieve general-purpose language generation and other natural language processing tasks such as classification.Based on language models, LLMs acquire these abilities by learning statistical relationships from vast amounts of text during a computationally intensive self-supervised and semi-supervised training process.

results.title: What is a large language model (LLM)? | Cloudflare
results.content: LLMs are AI programs that can recognize and generate text, among other tasks. They are trained on huge data sets of language and use deep learning and transformer models to learn context and patterns.

results.title: What are Large Language Models? | Definition from TechTarget
results.content: An LLM is the evolution of the language model concept in AI that dramatically expands the data used for training and inference. In turn, it provides a massive increase in the capabilities of the AI model. While there isn't a universally accepted figure for how large the data set for training needs to be, an LLM typically has at least one ...

results.title: What is an LL.M.? | LLM GUIDE
results.content: April 12, 2023 - The LLM - short for Master of Laws - is an internationally recognized postgraduate law degree that is usually completed in one year of full-time studies. It's different from a JD or an LLB, which are first law degrees and are generally required to practice law.

results.title: LLM Degree | Masters of Laws | The Law School Admission Council
results.content: Learn about the LLM, or Master of Laws, a graduate qualification in the field of law for lawyers who want to expand their knowledge and gain international credentials. Find out how to apply, what to expect, and how an LLM can help you achieve your academic and career goals.

results.title: What are Large Language Models? - LLM AI Explained - AWS
results.content: September 2, 2023 - Learn what Large Language Models are and why LLMs are essential. Discover its benefits and how you can use it to create new content and ideas including text, conversations, images, video, and audio.

results.title: What Are Large Language Models (LLMs)? | IBM
results.content: Large language models (LLMs) are a category of foundation models trained on immense amounts of data making them capable of understanding and generating natural language and other types of content to perform a wide range of tasks.

results.title: Master of Laws - Wikipedia
results.content: March 15, 2024 - The length of time to study an LLM program depends on the mode of study. Most full-time on-campus courses take one academic year to complete. Other students may complete their LLM program on a part-time basis over two years, and increasingly courses are available online.

results.title: What are Large Language Models(LLMs)?
results.content: A large language model, or LLM, is a deep learning model that can understand, learn, summarize, translate, predict, and generate text and other content based on knowledge gained from massive datasets. Large language models - successful applications of transformer models. They aren't just for teaching AIs human languages, but for understanding ...

results.title: What are LLMs, and how are they used in generative AI?
results.content: LLMs are large language models that predict the next word based on input text. They are the basis for chatbots like ChatGPT and Bard, but they also face challenges such as bias, accuracy, and scalability.

results.title: LM Studio - Discover, download, and run local LLMs

results.title: A Comprehensive Overview of Large Language Models - arXiv.org
results.content: LLM research, it has become considerably challenging to perceive the bigger picture of the advances in this direction. results.title: [2402.06196] Large Language Models: A Survey - arXiv.org
results.content: A review of the most prominent Large Language Models (LLMs), their characteristics, contributions and limitations, and the techniques and datasets for building and evaluating them. The paper also discusses the open challenges and future research directions in the LLM area.

results.title: What is a large language model (LLM)? - Elastic
results.content: Learn what a large language model (LLM) is, how it works, and what it can do. LLMs are deep learning algorithms that can perform various natural language processing tasks, such as translation, chatbots, and code generation.

results.title: Generation with LLMs - Hugging Face
results.content: If you're interested in basic LLM usage, our high-level Pipeline interface is a great starting point. However, LLMs often require advanced features like quantization and fine control of the token selection step, which is best done through generate().Autoregressive generation with LLMs is also resource-intensive and should be executed on a GPU for adequate throughput.

results.title: Wikipedia:Large language models - Wikipedia
results.content: While large language models (colloquially termed "AI chatbots" in some contexts) can be very useful, machine-generated text (much like human-generated text) can contain errors or flaws, or be outright useless. Specifically, asking an LLM to "write a Wikipedia article" can sometimes cause the output to be outright fabrication, complete with ...
